scripts.build-ios-prod: fvm flutter clean && fvm flutter build ipa --obfuscate --split-debug-info=./.split-debug-info && ./upload_ipa.sh "./build/ios/ipa/Conference Radio.ipa"
scripts.build-android-prod: fvm flutter build appbundle --obfuscate --split-debug-info=./.split-debug-info && npm run open-android-release-folder
